alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Northwest Randolph; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Randolph, northeastern Upshur and southern Barbour Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Philippi, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkins, Philippi, Audra State Park, Belington, Junior, Montrose, Kerens and Volga. This includes Route 33 between mile markers 32 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
